entries.text: (Near Tower of Prayer) We knew you were coming...
(Near Tower of Prayer) And stopped singing...
(Near Tower of Prayer) We are Milfanito.
(Near Tower of Prayer) We are here to sing to those bound by death and Dark.
(Near Tower of Prayer) We will sing here, forever, as we always have, from long, long ago.
(Near Tower of Prayer) We know nothing of the world outside.
(Near Tower of Prayer) And why should we? For we will never leave.
(Near Tower of Prayer) Do you seek King Vendrick?
(Near Tower of Prayer) But what is a king, after all?
(Near Tower of Prayer) We know nothing of the world outside.
(Near Tower of Prayer) For we will never leave here.
(Near Tower of Prayer) When we sing, the little ones dance.
(Near Tower of Prayer) The little ones grant comfort to those who bear death and Dark.
(Near Tower of Prayer) This is what we were taught.
(Near Tower of Prayer) Is there anything wrong?
(Near Tower of Prayer) Perhaps this will help.
(Near Tower of Prayer) This is all that we can do.
(Near Tower of Prayer) We hear a song in the distance.
(Near Tower of Prayer) You rescued a Milfanito who was taken from us.
(Near Tower of Prayer) Take this... We Milfanito thank you.
(Near Tower of Prayer) What did we ever do...
(Near Tower of Prayer) Are you never satisfied... Aren't you ever satisfied...
(Near Tower of Prayer) Oh!
(Near Tower of Prayer) Ah!
(Near Tower of Prayer) What...
##(Near Tower of Prayer) All we can do...is sing...
(Near Tower of Prayer) You quelled that cursed singing.
(Near Tower of Prayer) They may be of no use outside, but please take these.
(Near Tower of Prayer) We hear a song in the distance.
(Near Tower of Prayer) You rescued a Milfanito who was taken from us.
(Near Tower of Prayer) Take this... We Milfanito thank you.
(Near Rise of the Dead) Who are you...
(Near Rise of the Dead) And what do you want from us?
(Near Rise of the Dead) Milfanito, that is what we are called.
(Near Rise of the Dead) My name?
(Near Rise of the Dead) Do you mean our name?
(Near Rise of the Dead) We know nothing of the outside world...
(Near Rise of the Dead) We sing eternally for those who bear death and Dark within themselves.
(Near Rise of the Dead) We have been here forever.
(Near Rise of the Dead) We know nothing of the outside world, and we do not need to.
(Near Rise of the Dead) The little ones were born from the Great Dead One.
(Near Rise of the Dead) And the Great Dead One taught us song.
(Near Rise of the Dead) We have sung ever since. To comfort those bound by death and Dark.
(Near Rise of the Dead) This is what we were taught.
(Near Rise of the Dead) Do you seek comfort, too?
(Near Rise of the Dead) You poor thing...
(Near Rise of the Dead) Take this, at the very least.
(Near Rise of the Dead) This is all that we can do.
(Near Rise of the Dead) What...will you do to us?
(Near Rise of the Dead) Why are you here?
(Near Rise of the Dead) Oh!
(Near Rise of the Dead) Ah!
(Near Rise of the Dead) We never...
##(Near Rise of the Dead) We exist...to sing...
(Near Rise of the Dead) You silenced that cursed singing.
(Near Rise of the Dead) Please accept these as a thank-you.
(Castle) Ah...Ahh...
(Castle) Ahh...Ah...
(Castle) Ahh...Ahhh...
(Castle) Oh!
(Castle) Ah...Ahh...
(Castle) Ah...Ah...
